actions.text: Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.

official_title: A resolution to provide that the bill H.R. 8331 to amend the Securities Investor Protection Act of 1970, with the Senate amendments thereto, be taken from the Speaker's table, and that the Senate amendments be agreed to with an amendment.

summary.text: Resolves that the bill H.R. 8331 to amend the Securities Investor Protection Act of 1970, with the Senate amendments, be taken from the Speaker's table, and that the Senate amendments be agreed to with an amendment of the House of Representatives.

titles.title: A resolution to provide that the bill H.R. 8331 to amend the Securities Investor Protection Act of 1970, with the Senate amendments thereto, be taken from the Speaker's table, and that the Senate amendments be agreed to with an amendment.
